game.name: Medieval Life Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Rise from nothing to wealth! Mine ore, harvest crops, cut trees, gather livestock products, sell resources, hire workers, buy rentable houses, gamble with card games, bet on fights, and expand into an empire.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rise from nothing to wealth! Mine ore, harvest crops, cut trees, gather livestock products, sell resources, hire workers, buy rentable houses, gamble with card games, bet on fights, and expand into an empire.
